Are you guys seriously so fucking naive ? It is called projection mapping technology. For people watching it on youtube itll be like a video playing on screen. But for people sitting there it'll be like Kratos and Atreus are standing on the Stadium. People on the left will have their perspective view, people on the right will have their perspective view. Kind of like 7D.

At this point, assuming an upset does not occur,  2018 GOTY will be a ferocious battle between God of War & Red Dead Redemption II.  Games that will contend, but probably not hit the insane heights of GOW & RDR2 are: Spider-Man, Days Gone, Shadow of the Tomb Raider, Kingdom Hearts 3, something AAA from Nintendo....and if things go EXTREMELY well, possibly the next Battlefield and Call of Duty entries.  But it's worth noting there could be unannounced AAA titles that will be contenders as well....especially if we get something from Bethesda (like the rumored Starfield).  And what's Microsoft going to release in the fall excluding Forza?!! And if Cyberpunk 2077 or Death Stranding are 2018 titles (which I doubt very highly), that will dramatically change the outlook.
